16      /**

18       * 
19       * @param image
20       *            the image
21       * @param filename
22       *            the filename
23       */
24      public CacheImage(BufferedImage image, String filename) {
25          this.image = image;
26          this.fName = filename;
27      }
28  
29      /*

31       * 
32       * @see nl.eleni.gcc.vpziek.cache.CachableImage#getImage()

37      }
38

51       * 
52       * @see nl.eleni.gcc.vpziek.cache.CachableImage#isValid()
53       */
54      @Override
55      public boolean isValid() {
56          return ((this.image != null) && (this.fName != null));
57      }
